We are pleased to announce the release of version 0.5.7 and 0.6.1. Both versions focus on improving compatibility with a number of leading Joomla extensions. A few smaller features where also added based on the feedback of our partners and their customers.

** Added Features**

  • A new language switcher layout introduced.
  • Fixed token issues in some browsers.

Tested extensions

  1. Comments : Jom Comment Pro
  2. Events : Event List
  3. Files : Rokdownloads, DOCman
  4. Forms : CK Form, RSForms Pro
  5. Forums : Fireboard
  6. Images : Morfeo Gallery
  7. Lists : Simplelists
  8. Video : Denvideo

This list is not exclusive but is based on the feedback from our partners on the extensions they are actually using for their clients. Don’t see your Joomla extension on this list?  Contact us and we will help you get up and running with Nooku.
